testcases.Name: Addition: -72 + 301
testcases.Body:
Test Name: Addition: -72 + 301

Preconditions:
- Calculator is launched
- Standard mode is selected
- Memory is cleared

Test Steps:
1. Enter -72
2. Press +
3. Enter 301
4. Press =

Expected Result:
- Display shows 229
